pages.text:
Learn More About Fort Walton Beach's Favorite Restaurant & Bar
FUBAR Pizza Bar: Our Place
Locally Owned, Waterfront Vibes, and Almost Famous Pizza
Get to Know FUBAR Pizza Bar
Welcome to FUBAR Pizza Bar—your go-to hangout on Okaloosa Island for ice-cold beer, hot pizza, all live sports, and stunning waterfront views. We show every major game, including UFC fights, with no cover charge—ever. Whether you're arriving by land or boat, FUBAR is a local favorite for family-friendly fun, unforgettable catering & private parties, and good times from brunch to last call.
Food & Drink
Brunch Menu
Kid-Friendly Entertainment While You Kick Back
Arcade Fun for All Ages
At FUBAR Pizza Bar, we've built a game room packed with arcade fun for kids and grown-ups alike. From pool tables and darts to foosball and video games, it's the perfect place for the whole family to play while you enjoy a cold drink, hot pizza, and the waterfront view on Okaloosa Island.
Kids Menu
Dock & Dine with Waterfront Views
Boat Parking on Okaloosa Island
Boating all day? Dock your boat at one of FUBAR’s 8 boat slips and come refuel with the best pizza
menu
and
drinks
in Fort Walton Beach. Whether you're cruising or beach-bound, our bayside spot makes it easy to dock, dine, and relax. Don’t forget to stock your cooler with ice, cold beer, and bottled drinks from our
Beach & Boat Menu
before heading back out on the water.
Location
Order Direct
For Pickup
Everything You Need to Know About FUBAR Pizza Bar
Frequently Asked Questions
Planning a visit to FUBAR Pizza Bar on Okaloosa Island? Get answers about reservations, parking, boat slips, catering, menus, and more right here—before you even dock or dine.
Where is FUBAR Pizza Bar located?
FUBAR Pizza Bar is located at
114 Amberjack Drive on Okaloosa Island in Fort Walton Beach, FL
—right on the bay, with stunning waterfront views and easy access by car or boat.
Can I make a reservation at FUBAR Pizza Bar?
Yes! Call us at
850-226-7084
to reserve your table. We strongly recommend reservations for parties of 15 or more. Area fees may apply for large or private group gatherings.
Does FUBAR Pizza Bar offer online ordering?
Absolutely! You can
order online
for pickup directly through our website. We also offer delivery via DoorDash, Grubhub, and Uber Eats throughout Fort Walton Beach.
Is there boat parking available?
Yes, FUBAR has 8 boat slips available on the bay side of Okaloosa Island. Dock your boat and come enjoy cold drinks, great food, and waterfront vibes.
Is FUBAR Pizza Bar kid-friendly?
Definitely! We offer a
kid’s menu
and have an arcade and game room with pool tables, foosball, and more to keep the whole family entertained.
Do you offer catering or host private events?
Yes, we
cater events
for pickup or delivery and offer
private party areas
—including a 300-person outdoor deck and optional private bar. Contact us to customize your menu and space.
Are pets allowed at FUBAR Pizza Bar?
Yes! Our outdoor patio is pet-friendly. Bring your furry friend and enjoy a relaxing meal by the water in Fort Walton Beach.
FUBAR Pizza Bar Photo Gallery
See What the Buzz Is About
From sunset sips to game-day cheers, our photo gallery gives you a taste of the good times at FUBAR Pizza Bar. Check out the food, the fun, and the waterfront views that keep locals and visitors coming back!
